questions.text: Light travels in a straight line.
The speed of light in glass is more than the speed of light in air.
. A convex lens always forms a virtual image.
A concave mirror can form a real image.
The unit of electric current is Ampere.
Resistance decreases when the length of the conductor increases.
A voltmeter is connected in series in a circuit.
A fuse wire has a low melting point.
Magnetic field lines always form closed loops.
The electric power formula is P = VI.
